name: Dice Game (itch) (LadyMarina)
description:
A puzzle game easy to understand and difficult to master, move the cube to place its white part on the orange plate!

Use the normal mode to practice the different techniques on the 17 levels there are, and then try to get the record in random mode. On random mode  you will need to complete as much of the random-generated maps as you can before the time runs out.

The game comes with a save system for the levels, to save if the level has been completed and with how many starts.

Download the game here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Cube_Side
